scene_description_enriched: A bishop, identifiable by his mitre and cope, stands holding a crozier. He is depicted in profile, facing right, with a halo indicating his sanctity. The background consists of a simple, dark wall with vertical panels, suggesting an interior setting. The bishop wears a white alb and a richly decorated cope adorned with blue floral motifs on a gold background, bordered with red and gold stripes. He holds a golden crozier topped with a cross.
